original_title: Earth Prayers Two: Seasons of the Heart
overview: Blending music, poetry and mellow images, this soothing video offers a great way to ease the stress of everyday living and enter a world of serenity. Actor Michael York narrates three 35-minute segments featuring tranquil sights and sounds. William Shakespeare, Robert Frost, Percy Bysshe Shelley, Mother Theresa and others provide the verse while Secret Garden, Michael Hopp√©, Ron Clearfield and Patrick Ki supply the music.
title: Earth Prayers Two: Seasons of the Heart
